tool_description: Performs comprehensive RAM testing including pattern tests, stress tests, and timing analysis to identify memory-related issues.

memory_type.description: Memory type (DDR3, DDR4, DDR5, LPDDR4, LPDDR5)

error_messages: Invalid memory size: Total memory must be between 1-1024 GB.
Unsupported memory type: Use DDR3, DDR4, DDR5, LPDDR4, or LPDDR5.
Invalid test passes: Must be between 1-10 passes.
Invalid test patterns: Use walking_ones, checkerboard, random, or stress_pattern.
Memory not accessible: Cannot access system memory for testing.
usage: Specify total_memory_gb and memory_type. Optionally configure test_passes, test_patterns, and skip_slow_tests. The tool will perform comprehensive memory testing.

errors_found.description: Total number of memory errors detected
